attributes.action: instruct local auhorities to allow student claims for council tax relief where course attendance is a minimum of 504 hours per academic year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Advice to local authorites is prescriptive and states that students must attend courses for an average of 21 hours for a minimum of 24 weeks to qualify for a 25% reduction in Council Tax. A student who attends for 34 weeks for 15 hours actually spends more time studying (and is therefore economically inactive for that time) but fails to qualify for the relief.
